programmes.show_description: Dive into the neon-lit 90s clubs filled with Infectious beats and dance classics not to be missed. From high-energy Eurodance to pulsating house anthems, come throw some shapes!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
Non-stop 90s guitar rock, Brit Pop & power ballads! From Bon Jovi & Blur to Def Leppard, Queen & REM.
Bruno Brookes with the biggest UK rock tracks of the 90s. Expect a decent slice of Stereophonics, Bon Jovi, Nirvana & RHCP. But you might be surprised at the No.1!
Non-stop 90s guitar rock, Brit Pop & power ballads! From Bon Jovi & Blur to Def Leppard, Queen & REM.
These rebellious teens rocked every college campus throughout the 90s. Expect monster anthems from Kiss, Green Day, Smash Mouth, The Crash Test Dummies & many more!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!

programmes.show_name: As Seen On TV with Robin Banks
programmes.show_description: Robin Banks' chart with big TV connections - could be theme tunes, Comic Relief, adverts or just a song made famous by a TV show. Our top 25 chart is Absolutely Fabulous!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
In order - Mark Goodier's 12 hour journey through the decade's biggest number 1 songs, from Vanilla Ice & Chesney Hawkes to Boyzone, Backstreet Boys & B*Witched.
Let the party begin. Huge feel good anthems & sing-out-loud classics - all from the decade of dance!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
A little bit of love in the 90s from the likes of Take That, George Michael, Boyzone, Whitney Houston, Celine Dion and a load more.

programmes.show_name: Cuddle on the Couch - The Love 50
programmes.show_description: 4 hours of 90s love. What more could you ask for? We all need a cuddle on the couch every now and again.
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
Pat Man selects 30 chart toppers of the 90s that have probably slipped your mind! Expect lesser hits from Westlife, Geri Halliwell, All Saints & S-Club 7. Plus a Teletubby or 2.
Popcorn at the ready, these are NOW 90s' biggest songs from the movies. But don't forget to switch off your mobile phone!

programmes.show_name: The Opening Track from Every NOW!
programmes.show_description: A look back at the opening tracks from all the 90s NOW albums - from Erasure on NOW 17 to Britney Spears on NOW 44.
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
They came from nowhere, but left a lasting mark - sometimes good, and sometimes very bad! From Vanilla Ice & Right Said Fred to Scatman John & The Mike Flowers Pops!
Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes returns with a countdown of the 40 biggest singles of the decade. Including 37 UK number 1s & big million-selling hits from Britney, Cher & Elton John.
Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.
